text: <@U02RPKXLL67> how do you feel about this <https://www.producthunt.com/upcoming/popwork-2|new version of the text ? >

elements.text: how do you feel about this

text:
Hey <@U02QE53NQCU>! I think this is definitely on a good track. I just have a few suggestions that you could play around with - nothing major though! I think you could bring “remotely or in person” even “for managers and their teams to get more from meetings, remotely or in-person” to your first line. “the app for managers and their teams to connect, remotely or in-person.” You could also add something to that second part that makes it clear all of this happens “all in one place.”

On another note, for me, as a ClickUp user, I find myself wondering what the differences are between the products. For example, does it record the meetings? Is it only for meetings or also for project management? This would be something more important for your actual launch page, not necessarily at this Upcoming Page, but definitely something you’ll want to answer for PHers.
